name: AstroDucks (Justin van Oort)
description:
It's already the 25th of December as 4 astroDucks slowly awaken from Cryosleep aboard the Quack-4. Oh no! Our brave space explorers will need to quickly work to set up an awesome Christmas party. After all, it's been a pretty long time in Cryosleep (almost 329 years) and we still have quite some time to go.

AstroDucks was made for the EpicMegaJam 2020!

Features

  • A whole space ship to explore.
  • 3 other space explorers to meet.
  • A Windows-XP simulator. (Duck-space travel is unfortunately very underfunded)
  • Zero-G-Christmas-Light-Hanging Gameplay (or almost, I suposse)
  • Random stuff + random junk = Christmas tree (??)
  • Lock-picking
  • A gift from Santa (wow!)

AstroDucks supports both keyboard / gamepad. In-game instructions will show for certain gameplay moments.
